solution_line_template: There are {oranges} + {apples} = <<{oranges}+{apples}={total_fruits}>>{total_fruits} oranges and apples altogether .
He sold {oranges} x {oranges_fraction_sold} = <<{oranges}*{oranges_fraction_sold}={oranges_sold}>>{oranges_sold} pieces of oranges.
He sold {apples} x {apples_fraction_sold} = <<{apples}*{apples_fraction_sold}={apples_sold}>>{apples_sold} pieces of apples.
So, Tom was left with {total_fruits} - {oranges_sold} - {apples_sold} = <<{total_fruits}-{oranges_sold}-{apples_sold}={fruits_left}>>{fruits_left} pieces.
